transcript.text: Good morning all, thanks for being here.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_Betty

transcript.text: Hey!
transcript.speaker: Speaker_Lisa

transcript.text: Morning!
transcript.speaker: Speaker_Patricia

transcript.text: Alright, today's focus is our Design Review.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_Betty

transcript.text: On the product side,
transcript.speaker: Speaker_Betty

transcript.text: Scott and Emily, could you both work together to define success metrics?
transcript.speaker: Speaker_Betty

transcript.text: Yes, we can handle that.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_Scott

transcript.text: Sounds good to me.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_Emily

transcript.text: Let's talk about business for a moment.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_Betty

transcript.text: We need someone to prepare the quarterly report.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_Betty

transcript.text: I'll handle that no later than Friday.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_Emily

transcript.text: Great, thanks for taking that on.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_Betty

transcript.text: On the business side,
transcript.speaker: Speaker_Betty

transcript.text: We need someone to prepare the quarterly report.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_Betty

transcript.text: I'll handle that early next week.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_Patricia

transcript.text: Great, thanks for taking that on.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_Betty

transcript.text: On the business side,
transcript.speaker: Speaker_Betty

transcript.text: Emily and Patricia, could you both work together to negotiate the contract terms?
transcript.speaker: Speaker_Betty

transcript.text: Target completion is next Thursday.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_Betty

transcript.text: Yes, we can handle that.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_Emily

transcript.text: Sounds good to me.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_Patricia

transcript.text: Let's talk about business for a moment.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_Betty

transcript.text: Emily, I'd like you to prepare the presentation slides.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_Betty

transcript.text: Sure, happy to.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_Emily

transcript.speaker: Speaker_Betty

transcript.text: Not from my side.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_Lisa

transcript.text: No blockers.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_Patricia

transcript.text: Sounds good. Thanks team, looking forward to seeing the results.
transcript.speaker: Speaker_Betty

transcript.text: See you!
transcript.speaker: Speaker_Lisa

transcript.text: Bye all!
transcript.speaker: Speaker_Patricia
